title: Subtree Removal Game with Fibonacci Tree

content.content:
Still having no idea why this works after reading wikis. Whoever asks this in real interview should be banned from doing it unless it's game theory engineer position

`return n%6 != 1;`

No one should waste his/her time to understand such a boring question... If anyone meets this question in the interview, I recommend you to give up the interview directly...\n\nThe knowledge relevant to this question is way too specific than the knowledege needed for a general SWE interview...
